task.title: Booking a Room
task.shortdesc: When you book a room with AirClassroomBNB, it’s important to remember that you’re requesting to use someone else’s classroom. Now that you’ve gotten to know us, we’d like to get to know you, too!

step.cmd: Complete your AirClassroomBNB profile on the website by including photos and any references you may have.
Ensure the classroom you want is available for rent by checking the dates you’d like to check in and out and indicating the number of guests you plan on having,
Click the Request to Book button to send a reservation request to the host.

substep.cmd: The host will typically respond within 24 hours.
